Description.Text: Quest Canberra Apartment is conveniently located in the popular Canberra City Centre area. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, printer, facilities for disabled guests. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, desk, mini bar. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Quest Canberra Apartment.
